title: BBC Local Live: Greater Manchester on Thursday 8 September 2016 - BBC News
summary: gmp officer suspended over use of hillsborough .
assault charge after newborn baby was punched .
man seriously injured after being struck by a vehicle in salford .
dame sarah storey to compete in cycling at rio paralym .

documents.title: headlines from greater manchester and east cheshire
text: live updates from greater manchester and east cheshire have finished for the day , but we 'll be back from 08:00 on friday with the latest news , sport , weather and travel from across the region .
author: Lynette Horsburgh
Reporter, BBC News Online

documents.title: weather : cloudy skies with patchy rainfor 18:00
text: there will be mostly cloudy skies overnight with further patchy rain at times .
some heavy bursts are likely , especially at first , though there will be some clear spells too .
more from bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: travel : road still closed due to fire
text: king 's road in ashton-under-lyne is still closed in both directions between queen 's road and andrew street because of a building fire .
there is queuing traffic on the m60 clockwise between junction 9 ( trafford park ) and junction 12 , m62 ( eccles interchange ) .
more on bbc travel
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: paralym dame sarah storey qualifies for pursuit final
text: dame sarah storey broke her own world record to qualify for the final of the c5 3000m individual pursuit on day one of the rio paralym
storey , 38 , who posted a time of three minutes 31.394 seconds , is chasing a record 12th paralympic gold medal .
the star who lives in disley , cheshire will take on fellow briton crystal lane in the final at 21:12 bst .
gb are guaranteed a medal too in the c1-3 3000m individual pursuit after megan giglia beat her own world record by clocking 4:03.544 .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: bolton man wanted over threats to kill
text: a 45-year-old man from bolton is wanted by police .
alan bradshaw is wanted in connection with making threats to kill and a domestic-related assault in bolton and theft in wigan.police said are appealing for anyone with information to contact them .

documents.title: football : who would make your manchester xi ?
text: manchester united host manchester city at old trafford on saturday - but who would make your first-choice xi from the two squads ?
the two teams with 100 % records in the premier league this season meet at old trafford at 12:30 on saturday - and something has to give .
but if you could a starting xi from the multitude of talent available to both managers who would you go for ?
raheem sterling or marcus rashford ?
david silva or wayne rooney ?
john stones or eric bailly ?
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: gracie fields heritage trail officially opens
text: the gracie fields heritage trail is officially open with the unveiling at rochdale town hall of the eighth and final purple plaque dedicated to the star .
the plaques mark key locations in the life of the entertainer who was believed to be the highest paid actress in the world in the 1930s .
her travelling performances for troops during world war two led her to become known as `` the forces ' sweetheart '' .
she was appointed cbe for services to entertainment in 1938 and made a dame in 1979 a few months before her death aged 81 .
richard farnell leader of rochdale borough council said : gracie fields rose from humble beginnings to become an international superstar on the back of sheer talent and hard work .
he said it was `` about time she was properly recognised in her home town '' .

documents.title: breakinggmp officer suspended over alleged hillsborough image use
text: a police officer has been suspended for gross misconduct over the alleged use of images from the hillsborough disaster in an internal training session , greater manchester police said .

in a separate incident in june , gmp apologised for using a `` distressing '' photo of liverpool fans at hillsborough on a poster advertising `` super recognisers '' who are skilled at out a face in a crowd .
asst ch con debbie ford said : the fact that we believe these images have been used again is totally unacceptable . ''
she has written to the victims ' families apologising for the distress caused and has suspended the super recogniser programme until 2017 .

documents.title: vandals blamed for metrolink delays
text: vandals who threw jump leads on to overhead lines have been blamed for today 's delays on the metrolink line .
1/2 we apologise to all affected passengers for today 's delays on the altrincham line .
2/2 this was due to an act of vandalism with jump leads being thrown over the overhead line .
gmp are investigating .
this makes me so angry .
i hope the person responsible is found .
it 's such a shame for all the people who 's day has been affected .
like my 11 yr old daughter- only 4 days into high school & scared or the parents who battled traffic to get to their kids .
i hope she got home relatively easily .
up to tonight she 's found the met a good way to travel- the staff have been really kind to her too .
today was unfortunate
absolutely shameful and disgusting behaviour , sorry you have to deal with these kind of people .
thanks !
i just try to keep everyone informed !
people still manage to moan even when the problem was caused by vandals !
some people will never be satisfied .
it 's understandable for people to be frustrated though , even when it ca n't be helped .
what about all the other days , the poor frequency from the city and morning overcrowding ?
any apologies/resolutions for that ?
finally ! ! !
a genuine reason for a disruption , rather than points failures etc .

documents.title: moped rider dies in ditch crash
text: a moped rider from wigan has died after crashing into a ditch .
phillip parr mounted a grass verge on dam wood lane in in scarisbrick , lancashire before dropping into a large ditch at about 21:45 on wednesday , police said .
the 47-year-old suffered multiple injuries and was pronounced dead at the scene .
he had been riding a piaggio vespa towards burscough .
police appealed for two motorcyclists seen riding in front of him to contact them .

documents.title: two men jailed for killing man in leigh chip shop attack
text: two men have been jailed for killing a 50-year-old man outside a chip shop in leigh .
edward wood was attacked as he lay drunk near oceans eleven chip shop in railway road in may .
kevin darbyshire , 33 , of findlay street , leigh , and dwayne turner , 28 , of railway road , leigh , were jailed after pleading guilty to manslaughter .
david graham , from the crown prosecution service , said mr wood had `` offered no violence to the pair .
and was highly vulnerable due to him being intoxicated '' , adding the pair rifled through his pockets after the attack .

at liverpool crown court , darbyshire was sentenced to ten years with an extended three years for having his community order revoked for a separate matter and turner was given nine-year prison sentence .

documents.title: football : what 's the difference between mourinho and guardiola ?
text: eidur gudjohnsen , who played under both jose mourinho and pep guardiola , explains what he sees as the difference between the two men , ahead of the manchester derby on saturday .
watch more on the rivalry between jose mourinho and pep guardiola on the premier league show today on bbc two .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: oldham man 's contaminated blood 'injustice ' claim
text: a man infected with hepatitis c through contaminated blood says it is an `` injustice '' victims receive less compensation than those who contracted hiv .
alex smith , from oldham , said it was an `` injustice '' victims were receiving far less than those who contracted hiv through nhs blood products in the 1970s and 80s .
his solicitors have asked the department of health ( doh ) for comparable help .
the doh said it was `` more than doubling '' its annual spending .

documents.title: plans for 18-hole golf course in bolton
text: major plans are about to be put forward by peel group which could lead to bolton hosting one of the world 's biggest sporting events
author: Bolton News

documents.title: weather : pleasant afternoon with sunny spells
text: after a wet start it will brighten up leaving a pleasant afternoon with sunny spells for all .
more from bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: teletext artist from wigan turning news into art in germany
text: four years after teletext services ended in the uk , a man has continued creating `` teletext art '' using blocky graphics and the bright colours used by ceefax and teletext pages .
dan farrimond from wigan has been hired as an artist-in-residence in germany producing graphics for a tv channel which still has an analogue-style text service .
every day he will take at least one of the day 's headlines - and turn it into a piece of art .

documents.title: smartphone study on weather and pain reveals early data
text: a study by the university of manchester into how weather affects chronic pain has released some early , surprising results .
people across three uk cities reported less time in severe pain as the weather warmed up from february to april - but pain then increased again in june .

researchers are collecting data from 9000 people via a smartphone app for the cloudy with a chance of pain project in the hope of shedding scientific light on the idea that we can `` feel the weather in our bones '' .
the preliminary findings .
were presented at the british science festival in swansea .
author: Jonathan Webb
Science reporter, BBC News

documents.title: rio paralym dame sarah storey aims for more gold
text: dame sarah storey is aiming to retain the four paralym she won at london 2012 later .
storey , from disley , cheshire , has won 11 paralym and goes for another in the c5 pursuit at 15:10 .
her medal haul for britain is second only to swimmer mike kenny , who won 16 golds and two silvers from 1976 to 1988 .
want to know what is happening and when ?
check out bbc sport 's day by day guide .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: gmp disciplinary of officer with alleged gambling debts halted after evidence blunder
text: an evidence blunder has scuppered a disciplinary hearing into a gmp inspector who has accused by his bosses of `` deceiving '' colleagues to pay off his gambling debts .
author: Manchester Evening News

documents.title: football : dale 's spotland home renamed in new deal
text: rochdale have renamed their spotland ground the crown oil arena after agreeing a six-figure , five-year sponsorship deal .
it is the first time that the ground has been renamed for a sponsor .
dale , who bought the stadium outright earlier this year , groundshare with rugby league side rochdale hornets .
`` today is a landmark day for rochdale and one which at times over the past 10 years i could only ever dream would happen , '' said chairman chris dunphy .
author: BBC Sport

text: headlines from greater manchester and east cheshire

documents.title: man seriously injured after being hit by car in salford
text: a man has been seriously injured after being struck by a vehicle on bury new road , salford .
police said a ford explorer hit the man near the cavendish road junction at shortly after 21:30 last night .
police are appealing for witnesses .

documents.title: man charged with 'punching ' baby in supermarket
text: a 63-year-old man has been charged with assaulting a five-day-old girl at a supermarket in manchester .
david hardy , of longfield road , baguley , was bailed to appear at manchester and salford magistrates ' court on 4 october .
officers were called to the tesco store on altrincham road in baguley at about 18:45 bst on monday , following reports a baby had been punched .
the baby girl was taken to hospital as a precaution and has been discharged .

documents.title: rochdale imam murder accused denies sus
text: a man accused of murdering an imam tells a court he did not suspect a known sympathiser of the so-called islamic state ( is ) had bludgeoned him to death .
mohammed hussain syeedy , 21 , who denies murdering jalal uddin , 71 , in rochdale in february , is accused of acting as a getaway driver for mohammed kadir , 24 ,
three days after the killing , mr kadir , of oldham , fled abroad .
manchester crown court heard mr syeedy did not think mr kadir was violent and had never expressed is views to him .

documents.title: travel : severe delays on m60 clockwise due to crash
text: there is queuing traffic on the m60 clockwise between junction 1 , the stockport pyramid and junction 2 , cheadle roscoes roundabout , because of a crash and a rolling road-block .
congestion is back to junction 26 , stockport east .

documents.title: weather : cloudy skies with sunny spells later
text: it is a wet start for most with cloudy skies and outbreaks of rain , turning heavy at times , clearing to the east by the late morning .
brighter conditions will follow , leaving a pleasant afternoon with sunny spells for all .

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: welcome to greater manchester live .
we 're here until 18:00 with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather from across the 10 boroughs and east cheshire .
to share news , tip-offs or photographs you can contact us via email , facebook or twitter .
author: Lynette Horsburgh
Reporter, BBC News Online
